attributes.action: Let me talk to the prime minister about unemployment and higher education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many issues surrounding unemployment. I feel the largest one of these, is that many of those unemployed lack the skills and qualifications required by employers. These issues extend far beyond a single petition and therefore i would like to discuss them with the prime minister, at length. I wish for your support into giving me a day with the prime minister, of which in return i guarantee that unemployment figures will drop.

rejection.details:
Please put your request in writing to the Prime Minister at:

10 Downing Street, 
London, 
SW1A 2AA
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
